parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SecurityToken
parameters.description: The security token included in the WebSocket request header. The system uses this token to authenticate the request.

parameters.name: TrafficControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the throttling policy that you want to query.
